songs.title: The Impossible (The Reprise)
songs.lyrics:
Say it
Say it
(Forever your lady)
Forever your lady
I love you, boy
'Cause this is ecstasy
Now I love ya like sunsets, bubble baths on the jet
Love you like...
Love you like a freeze pop
I love you
I love you
I, I, I
(Forever your lady)
(This is ecstasy)
Now I
(Forever your lady)
Forever your lady
(Forever your lady)
I, I
Laying in the bed, bumping Jodeci
(Forever your lady)
Laying in the bed, bumping Jodeci
I love you like... oh
Baby, yeah, no matter what you do
I will love you
